00041 class QXmppStunMessage
00042 {
00043 public:
00044     enum MethodType {
00045         Binding      = 0x1,
00046         SharedSecret = 0x2,
00047         Allocate     = 0x3,
00048         Refresh      = 0x4,
00049         Send         = 0x6,
00050         Data         = 0x7,
00051         CreatePermission = 0x8,
00052         ChannelBind  = 0x9,
00053     };
00054 
00055     enum ClassType {
00056         Request    = 0x000,
00057         Indication = 0x010,
00058         Response   = 0x100,
00059         Error      = 0x110,
00060     };
00061
